name: mikroe.click.spiisolator6
short_description: SPI Isolator 6 Click is a compact add-on board representing a digital isolator optimized for a serial peripheral interface. This board features the MAX22345, a fast, low-power 4-channel digital galvanic isolator from Analog Devices. This device comes with a maximum data rate of 200Mbps and transfers digital signals between circuits with different power domains featuring reinforced isolation for a withstand voltage rating of 3.75kVRMS for 60 seconds.
